item.title: Clean Up Your Digital Life: How I Found 1929 Fully Identical Images, Dark, Bright and Blurry Shots in Minutes, For Free.
item.description:
‚úÖ Motivation

In today’s world of selfies and Instagram, we all take tons of photos on our phones, cameras, and other gadgets.

But let’s be real, it’s easy for our photo collections to become a chaotic mess, making it impossible to find that one special memory.

I mean, I’ve got gigabytes of photos on my Google Photo app filled with dark shots, overly exposed shots, blurry shots, and tons of duplicate stills.

item.title: fastdup: A Powerful Tool to Manage, Clean & Curate Visual Data at Scale on Your CPU - For Free.
item.description:
‚è≥ Last Updated: March 27, 2023.

‚úÖ Motivation

As a data scientist, you might be tempted to jump into modeling as soon as you can. I mean, that’s the fun part, right?

But trust me, if you skip straight to modeling without taking the time to really understand the problem and analyze the data, you’re setting yourself up for failure.

I’ve been there.
